short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast-forwards / Rewinds the video player by X seconds when a hotkey combination is pressed (default Alt+1 and Alt+2).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast-forwards / Rewinds the video player by X seconds when a hotkey combination is pressed (default Alt+1 and Alt+2). Works on Youtube, Twitch and other sites.
